title: Other Uses of ?
description: In this lab, it is explained that the ? operator in Rust can be used to automatically convert errors into the desired return type, eliminating the need for explicit error handling using map_err.

meta.title: Other Uses of the ? Operator in Rust
meta.description: Explore the versatility of the ? operator in Rust, including its ability to automatically convert errors into the desired return type.
meta.keywords: rust playground, error handling, automatic error conversion, programming tutorial, operator, rust online compiler, rust tutor, rust commands, rust practice, rust online
